title: Which VC's invested in HR Technology companies? - Quora

response.answer_text: HR Tech is a large and growing industry. Big data is fueling an increase in new companies tackling the challenges of recruiting, training and retaining talent.  Here are the most active investors in HR Tech, according to our data at CB Insights:  If you want to learn more about how we created this list, or funding trends in HR Tech, read the original research brief: HR Tech Funding Hits $1B in A Single Quarter Note: I'm on the community team at CB Insights.
I recommend you browse on AngelList for Human Resources Startups  that would answer your question :)
